tests: INSERT INTO qa_result (run_id, assertion_id, concept_id, details)
SELECT <RUNID>, '<ASSERTIONUUID>', d.conceptid, concat('Current concept (', c.id, ') with "fetal" in any term not modelled with Relationship type "Occurrence " = "Fetalperiod"', term)
